body:
This PR makes the `tcl` package extendable just like any other scripting language provided by the Spack builtin repo. I was initially thinking about adding a `TclPackage` mixin class (just like `CudaPackage`) but the resulting type would have been too minimal to justify a core change (imho, seeking advice from @tgamblin @alalazo here):

```python
class TclPackage(Package):
    extends('tcl')
```
title: Treat tcl as extendable
